structure.unit: ARTICLE X. DOWNTOWN KENDALL SYSTEM BETTERMENT

text.section:
Sec. 32-203. Special water construction connection charge.
The Board hereby approves the imposition of a special water construction connection charge of $0.58 per average daily gallon per day of water capacity at the time water service is requested for all buildings and properties located south of North Kendall Drive, east of the Palmetto Expressway (S.R. 826) and northwest of the Metrorail Corridor, which utilize the new water system capacity provided by the new water lines.
